Using in templates¶

Basic usage is just extends from base.html

{% extends 'gentelella/base.html' %}

Available block are

| - head
|   - meta
|   - title
|   - stylesheets
| - extra_css
| - extra_head
| - body
|   - sidebar
|   - top_navigation
|   - content_wrapper
|     -  messages
|     -  breadcrumbs
|     -  content_block_wrap
|        -  content
|   - footer
|   - javascripts

You can overwrite all blocks but remember use {{ block.super }}.
